summary: The 'DEI to DIE Act' aims to eliminate Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) and Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Accessibility (DEIA) programs, mandates, and positions within the Federal Government. It mandates the termination of DEI/DEIA initiatives, the review and revision of employment practices, and the collection of information on existing programs. The bill directs actions by agency heads, including reporting to the OMB and assessing the impact of prior DEI/DEIA programs. It also establishes meetings to advise the President on civil rights policies.
